tool_description: This API allows you to predict the class of clothing items and accessories by inputting an image
name: Fashion Classification
title: Fashion Classification

api_list.name: predictAll
api_list.description:
Post an image and get ***all class*** predictions.
Supported extensions: `jpeg`,  `jpg` , `png`

api_list.name: predict
api_list.description:
Post an image and get ***the most*** promising class prediction.
Supported extensions: `jpeg`,  `jpg` , `png`
